content.text:
{"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":149281,"originalJapaneseLine":"「選択肢を与えよう。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I will give you a choice."},{"lineNumber":149282,"originalJapaneseLine":"　退くなら私は黙って見送ろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"If you retreat, I will silently see you off."},{"lineNumber":149283,"originalJapaneseLine":"　だが、来れば……」","translatedEnglishLine":"But, if you come……\""},{"lineNumber":149284,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうするって？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What do you intend to do?\""},{"lineNumber":149285,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その濁った両目を潰す」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I will crush those clouded eyes of yours.\""},{"lineNumber":149286,"originalJapaneseLine":"臓腑まで凍るような低く冷たい声。","translatedEnglishLine":"A low, cold voice that freezes one to the core."},{"lineNumber":149287,"originalJapaneseLine":"その言葉が脅しなどではないことは","translatedEnglishLine":"There was no need to think twice to know that those words were not a threat."},{"lineNumber":149288,"originalJapaneseLine":"考えるまでもなかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"It was obvious."},{"lineNumber":149289,"originalJapaneseLine":"「意地か、目か。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Your pride, or your eyes."},{"lineNumber":149290,"originalJapaneseLine":"　選びたまえ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Choose.\""},{"lineNumber":149291,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こ、心の友、行くなよ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"D-Dear friend, don't go, okay?\""},{"lineNumber":149292,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス、待って！　ね、待って！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Rance, wait! Hey, wait!\""},{"lineNumber":149293,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ここまで馬鹿にされて退けるか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Will I back down after being mocked this much?!\""},{"lineNumber":149294,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わっ、馬鹿馬鹿！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-What, you idiot, idiot!"},{"lineNumber":149295,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前が戦えなくなりゃ人類は負け決定！","translatedEnglishLine":"If you stop fighting, humanity is doomed to lose!"},{"lineNumber":149296,"originalJapaneseLine":"　したら世界中の女の子も死ぬぞ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Then all the girls in the world would die too!?"},{"lineNumber":149297,"originalJapaneseLine":"「儂も魔人が斬れなくなる！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I won't be able to slay demons anymore either!"},{"lineNumber":149298,"originalJapaneseLine":"　冷静にならんかい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Calm down, will you!\""},{"lineNumber":149299,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やかましい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Shut up!\""},{"lineNumber":149300,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":149301,"originalJapaneseLine":"「し、シィルちゃんがいたら！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-If Shiil-chan were here!\""},

{"lineNumber":149302,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なに？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What?\""},

{"lineNumber":149303,"originalJapaneseLine":"「シィルちゃんがいたら、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If Shiil-chan were here,"},

{"lineNumber":149304,"originalJapaneseLine":"　絶対に止めていた……と、思う……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm sure she would have stopped me... I think...\""},

{"lineNumber":149305,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だから、お願い……もう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So please... no more...\""},

{"lineNumber":149306,"originalJapaneseLine":"かなみは最早祈るような顔をしていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kanami was now wearing a face that looked like a prayer."},

{"lineNumber":149307,"originalJapaneseLine":"怒りで熱くなっていたランスの頭が","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance's head, which had been burning with anger,"},

{"lineNumber":149308,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゆるやかに冷えていく。","translatedEnglishLine":"gradually cooled down."},

{"lineNumber":149309,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},

{"lineNumber":149310,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この馬鹿、泣くんじゃない」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You idiot, don't cry.\""},{"lineNumber":149311,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――撤退するぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"—We’re retreating.\""},{"lineNumber":149312,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、うん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-Yeah!\""},{"lineNumber":149313,"originalJapaneseLine":"「賢明だな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wise choice.\""},{"lineNumber":149314,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ここで殺さなかったこと、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Not killing you here,"},{"lineNumber":149315,"originalJapaneseLine":"　絶対に後悔させてやるぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I will make you regret it for sure.\""},{"lineNumber":149316,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ほう、それは悪くない」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Oh, that's not bad.\""},{"lineNumber":149317,"originalJapaneseLine":"「後悔は久しく忘れていた言葉だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Regret is a word I had long forgotten.\""},{"lineNumber":149318,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},

{"lineNumber":149319,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達が撤退していく様を、","translatedEnglishLine":"Watching Rance and the others retreat,"},

{"lineNumber":149320,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケッセルリンクは前言通り黙って見送った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kesselring silently saw them off as he had said before."},

{"lineNumber":149321,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスがシィルとシーラを奪還する為の戦いで","translatedEnglishLine":"In the battle for Rance to rescue Shiil and Sheila,"},

{"lineNumber":149322,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケッセルリンクに敗れて数日が経過した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Several days had passed since they were defeated by Kesselring."},

{"lineNumber":149323,"originalJapaneseLine":"その間もランスは幾度となく","translatedEnglishLine":"During that time, Rance repeatedly"},

{"lineNumber":149324,"originalJapaneseLine":"トランシルバニアの森を攻めたが、","translatedEnglishLine":"attacked the forest of Transylvania,"},

{"lineNumber":149325,"originalJapaneseLine":"成果はなく常にケッセルリンクに迎撃されていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"but there was no success and he was always intercepted by Kesselring."},

{"lineNumber":149326,"originalJapaneseLine":"各地で魔軍の侵攻を防いでいたヘルマン軍も、","translatedEnglishLine":"The Herman army, who was defending against the demon army's invasion in various places,"},

{"lineNumber":149327,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人退治の切り札であるランスが","translatedEnglishLine":"knew that Rance, the trump card for defeating demons,"},

{"lineNumber":149328,"originalJapaneseLine":"負け続けていることを知り絶望していた。","translatedEnglishLine":"was continuously losing and had fallen into despair."},

{"lineNumber":149329,"originalJapaneseLine":"兵は死に、物資は少なく、士気は下がり続ける。","translatedEnglishLine":"Soldiers died, supplies were scarce, and morale kept falling."},

{"lineNumber":149330,"originalJapaneseLine":"ヘルマン滅亡の時は近い。","translatedEnglishLine":"The time of Herman’s downfall was near."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「選択肢を与えよう。
退くなら私は黙って見送ろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you retreat, I will silently see you off.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、来れば……」
「どうするって？」
「その濁った両目を潰す」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I will crush those clouded eyes of yours."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 臓腑まで凍るような低く冷たい声。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A low, cold voice that freezes one to the core.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その言葉が脅しなどではないことは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There was no need to think twice to know that those words were not a threat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 考えるまでもなかった。
「意地か、目か。
選びたまえ」
「こ、心の友、行くなよ？」
「ランス、待って！　ね、待って！」
「ここまで馬鹿にされて退けるか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Will I back down after being mocked this much?!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わっ、馬鹿馬鹿！
お前が戦えなくなりゃ人類は負け決定！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you stop fighting, humanity is doomed to lose!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: したら世界中の女の子も死ぬぞ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then all the girls in the world would die too!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「儂も魔人が斬れなくなる！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I won't be able to slay demons anymore either!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 冷静にならんかい！」
「やかましい！」
「し、シィルちゃんがいたら！」
「なに？」
「シィルちゃんがいたら、
絶対に止めていた……と、思う……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm sure she would have stopped me... I think..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だから、お願い……もう……」
かなみは最早祈るような顔をしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kanami was now wearing a face that looked like a prayer.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怒りで熱くなっていたランスの頭が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance's head, which had been burning with anger,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゆるやかに冷えていく。
「この馬鹿、泣くんじゃない」
「――撤退するぞ」
「う、うん！」
「賢明だな」
「……ここで殺さなかったこと、
絶対に後悔させてやるぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will make you regret it for sure."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ほう、それは悪くない」
「後悔は久しく忘れていた言葉だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Regret is a word I had long forgotten."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達が撤退していく様を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Watching Rance and the others retreat,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケッセルリンクは前言通り黙って見送った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kesselring silently saw them off as he had said before.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがシィルとシーラを奪還する為の戦いで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the battle for Rance to rescue Shiil and Sheila,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケッセルリンクに敗れて数日が経過した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Several days had passed since they were defeated by Kesselring.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その間もランスは幾度となく
トランシルバニアの森を攻めたが、
成果はなく常にケッセルリンクに迎撃されていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but there was no success and he was always intercepted by Kesselring.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各地で魔軍の侵攻を防いでいたヘルマン軍も、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Herman army, who was defending against the demon army's invasion in various places,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人退治の切り札であるランスが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: knew that Rance, the trump card for defeating demons,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 負け続けていることを知り絶望していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was continuously losing and had fallen into despair.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵は死に、物資は少なく、士気は下がり続ける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Soldiers died, supplies were scarce, and morale kept falling.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン滅亡の時は近い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The time of Herman’s downfall was near.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:
